contentList.content:
Your total power, combined from your body and mental strength.
+1 per point in Endurance, Agility or Mind.

Your general body building and how good your are at accomplishing feats with it.
Each point also increase your Death Saving throw chances by 1%.
Value is average between Endurance and Agility (rounded down).

Best used for making someone yield by putting physical and/or mental pressure.
Target Number +1 per 3 points in Might.

Represents the social capabilities of your character. The Target Number increase based on how much points you already invested:
1-2 : +8
3-4 : +7
5-6 : +6
7-8 : +5
9-10 : +4
Each point in Persuasion increase the Target Number by 2
Each stat cannot go above 10.
Used to adjust the sight range of a character. Each point given or subtracted is 1m.

Your logic, think speed and mind raw processing power and memory.
Each point also increase your Identification chance of enemies vitality and armours by 3% on combat start. Your total chance is currently [1]%.
Your current cap is [2] and can be increased by Intelligence and Memory.

Your ability to move with finesse, sleight of hand, body supleness.
Each point also increase your Sight range by 0.5m. Your total sight is currently [1]m.
Your current cap is [2] and can be increased by Finesse and Wits.

Knowledge about nature, animals, tracking and orientation.
When doing a sleeping roll, if the result is under your survivalism score you can decide to reroll with a -3 penalty.

Best used to confuse someone, lie and distract.
Target Number +1 per point in Agility.
The current progression of the infusion. Its max is 5 times the current infusion value, and once it's reached, the infusion will increase. Grow only during combat.

Your ability to sustain physical pressures and keep going on a longer time but also your raw strength.
Each point also increase your Death Saving throw chances by 2%. Your total chance is currently [1]%.
Your current cap is [2] and can be increased by Strength and Constitution.

Perception and knowledge about magic, spells and rituals.
The GM can give a bonus if you're proficient with the magic you're trying to detect
Overall culture, advanced knowledge and history of Rivellon. Used for knowledge rolls if the subject of the roll does not fit in any other category.
Invest Persona points to develop your Social abilities. Each stack of 3 Persona points grants you one point to spend in Social.
Persona points are a currency to increase your stats. You can gain some by participating, but also as a reward for roleplaying and creating interesting situations.

Give you the ability to look for herbs and special ingredients during downtimes. Also reflects your knowledge about plants, chemistry and biology.
Rules works as follows: each point increase the Target number by 10 and the unit figure of the result is the number of ingredients found.
Fortune allow to roll again. Replenish once per session.
Reflects your knowledge in Sourcery. The greater it is, the more you can manipulate Tenebrium tainting.
Invest Persona points to develop your Knowledge. Each stack of 2 Persona points grants you one point to spend in Knowledge.
Reflect your body physical and spiritual condition. Each time you die, you loose a point. <font color=#ff0000>At 0, your character is completely knocked out !</font>
Invest Persona points to develop your Aptitudes. Each stack of 4 Persona points grants you one point to spend in Aptitudes.

Best used for convincing someone by reasoning, agreements and having arguments.
Target Number +1 per point in Mind.

Your ability to spot unusual things in the environment to catch details and fast movements.
Each point also increase your Sight range by 0.2m and your Identification chance by 1%.
Value is average between Agility and Mind (rounded down).

Gives your the ability to craft rings, Strength equipment and enhance it. Also reflects your knowledge about weapons, armors and geology.
See the rule sheet for detailed crafting rules.

Your ability to sustain mental pressure as well as pushing your limits.
Each point also increase your Death Saving throw chances by 1%.
Value is average between Endurance and Mind (rounded down).

Represents who you are physically and mentally. The Target Number increase based on how much points you already invested :
1-4 : +6
5-8 : +5
9-12 : +4
13-16 : +3
17-20 : +2
Each stat cannot go above a base of 8. This limit increased by your Attributes.

Best used for introspection as well as trying to get a hint in some situations.
Target Number +1 per point in Willpower.
Knowledge about common races body and how to cure deep afflictions that common spells can not cure. Can be used to cure some conditions if you have the proper tools.

Represents the knowledge of your character in diverse fields.The Target Number increase by 8 for each point invested.
Each point in Telekinesis and Loremaster increase the Target Number by 2
Each stat cannot go above 10.

Gives you the ability to enchant equipment, change wand/staff element and add sockets. Also reflects knowledge about enchantments.
See the rule sheet for detailed crafting rules.

Gives you the ability to craft belts, Finesse and Intelligence equipment and enhance it. Also reflects knowledge about clothing history, such as recognizing people or factions and emblems.
See the rule sheet for detailed crafting rules.

Best used for bartering, catching people attention, charm and generate emotions.
Target Number +1 per point in Endurance.

Best used to attempt reading someones emotions.
Target Number +1 per point in Perception.
